item.title: BOTTLE MATCH Squash
item.author: Charlie Braham,
item.description: With no feature in last year’s bottle, squash returned with noise, and lots of it. Ethos witnessed an atmosphere rivalling sporting cathedral, with quality squash played in a great competitive spirit. RSM took an early lead thanks to 4th string George Meddings who won 3⁄0, but were levelled …
